title: BadgerDAO BIP 66 (a). Revise DIGG Emissions, fund KPI Options, Establish Treasury Controlled Liquidity for DIGG
body:
The BIP 66 proposal linked below has reached quorum with all three portions of the vote receiving overwhelming approval.
The proposal would create deeper and more concentrated liquidity for DIGG in the near-term by increasing/consolidating emissions and re-funding KPI options rewards; while also establishing a treasury controlled liquidity at a relatively low cost and provide scalability as DIGG goes through a positive rebase streak and creates more BTC.

See the proposal here:
https://forum.badger.finance/t/bip-66-revise-digg-emissions-fund-kpi-options-and-establish-tcl/4860

Vote:
Do you approve of the BIP 66 suggestions?
author: 0xEeeCC3537035B19e2F8a76229B36eE9F690848Cc
